articles.title: Pluto is alive! Scientists confirm volcanoes of ice, not seen anywhere in solar system, erupting on surface - India Today
articles.description: Even after 92 years of its discovery, Pluto still remains a mystery. Sixteen years ago, astronomers declared it unfit to be a planet. Now, they have discovered that it is very much alive.

articles.title: OnePlus 9 Pro is on sale for less than Rs 60,000, should you buy it or wait for OnePlus 10 Pro? - India Today
articles.description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is still a pretty good 5G smartphone that you can buy in 2022. The device is available at a discounted price on Amazon, just ahead of the OnePlus 10 Pro India launch, which will take place on March 31.
